Cute Full: Buy to decorate the windows at Halloween I could decorate two high windows without it making it empty. The material is of good quality even if you have to handle the big pieces gently to avoid them tearing off. If they are dirty a little soapy hot water and they are like new ready to be reused the following year. Only flat as the material is soft, reinstalling the different elements of the pumpkin takes a little patience because by sticking to the glass it is a bit deformed not allowing easy insertion of the teeth. But nothing serious in fact, good article, no bad surprise I recommend.

practical and effective : I am rather in the use of the legs (bike, elliptical, trek..) I was able to quickly observe an improvement in the muscles of the shoulders by doing some exercises every morning for 2 months ( 3 movements recommended on the leaflet ) . It is absolutely necessary to be in front of a mirror to have symmetrical gestures and to stand straight . The strap therefore simply remains in the bathroom and I shower after ^^

The design is more beautiful but we put less water in it because it never goes down more than the level of the cartridge (the bottom) The system on the bottom is ingenious but this lid does not fit well.
